rule.description: Urashobora kwinjiza igenamiterere ukoresheje menu-kanda iburyo kurupapuro urwo arirwo rwose .

url.title: Ubwoko bwa URL, URL yuzuye.
url.explain: Ubu buryo burashobora guhuza URL yuzuye.

glob.title: Uburyo bwa glob bukoresha isomero {{1}} isomero Nyamuneka reba kugirango ukoreshwe, cyangwa urashobora gushakisha imikoreshereze ya {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, ihuye na page ya YouTube hamwe na subpage zose.

regexp.title: Imvugo isanzwe, nyamuneka reba Reba kugirango ukoreshwe.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Gusa bitangira gukurikizwa kumategeko ariho:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: Niba bigenzuwe, birashobora gukoreshwa gusa kubitegeko biriho, ubundi amategeko yose yisi arashobora gukoreshwa.
